verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> had לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <S%H3092><s%> Now Jehoshaphat עֹ֥שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> had riches וְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance וַיִּתְחַתֵּ֖ן <S%H2859><s%> and joined affinity לְאַחְאָֽב׃ <S%H256><s%> with Ahab

וַיֵּרֶד֩ <S%H3381><s%> he went down לְקֵ֨ץ <S%H7093><s%> And after שָׁנִ֤ים <S%H8141><s%> [certain] years אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> to Ahab לְשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria וַיִּֽזְבַּֽח־ <S%H2076><s%> killed ל֨וֹ אַחְאָ֜ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab צֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּבָקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> and oxen לָרֹ֔ב <S%H7230><s%> for him in abundance וְלָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and for the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וַיְסִיתֵ֕הוּ <S%H5496><s%> that [he had] with him and persuaded לַעֲל֖וֹת <S%H5927><s%> him to go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against רָמ֥וֹת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַחְאָ֣ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <S%H3092><s%> unto Jehoshaphat מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> with רָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֗וֹ כָּמ֤וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> according to כָמ֙וֹךָ֙ <S%H3644><s%> you וּכְעַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> him I [am] as thou [art] and my people עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> as thy people וְעִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> in בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> and [we will be] with thee in the war

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דְּרָשׁ־ <S%H1875><s%> Enquire נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please כַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> I pray thee at the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ץ <S%H6908><s%> gathered together מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Therefore the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִאִים֮ <S%H5030><s%> of prophets אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִישׁ֒ <S%H376><s%> men וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> against הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אֶחְדָּ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> or shall I forbear וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> ? And they said עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up וְיִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> will deliver הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> for God בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [it] into the king's

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <S%H3092><s%> But Jehoshaphat הַאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> is there פֹּ֥ה <S%H6311><s%> here נָבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> [Is there] not here a prophet לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet וְנִדְרְשָׁ֖ה <S%H1875><s%> besides that we might enquire מֵאֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֡ט <S%H3092><s%> unto Jehoshaphat ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is yet אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֡ד <S%H259><s%> [There is] yet one לִדְרוֹשׁ֩ <S%H1875><s%> by whom we may enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3069><s%> God מֵֽאֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I שְׂנֵאתִ֗יהוּ <S%H8130><s%> but I hate כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֠ינֶנּוּ <S%H369><s%> never מִתְנַבֵּ֨א <S%H5012><s%> him for he never prophesied עָלַ֤י <S%H5921><s%> concerning לְטוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> good כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> but יָמָ֣יו <S%H3117><s%> unto me but always לְרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> evil ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> He מִיכָ֣יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> the same [is] Micaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִמְלָ֑א <S%H3229><s%> of Imla וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> say הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Let not the king כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> called מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about סָרִ֖יס <S%H5631><s%> [of his] officers אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> for one וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מַהֵ֖ר <S%H4116><s%> Fetch quickly [מִיכָהוּ כ] (מִיכָ֥יְהוּ <S%H4318><s%> Micah ק) בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִמְלָֽא׃ <S%H3229><s%> of Imla

וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <S%H3092><s%> and Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֡ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יוֹשְׁבִים֩ <S%H3427><s%> sat אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> either עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֜וֹ <S%H3678><s%> of them on his throne מְלֻבָּשִׁ֤ים <S%H3847><s%> clothed בְּגָדִים֙ <S%H899><s%> in [their] robes וְיֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> and they sat בְּגֹ֔רֶן <S%H1637><s%> in a void place פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the entering in שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַ֨נְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> and all the prophets מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֖ים <S%H5012><s%> prophesied לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> had made ל֛וֹ צִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H6667><s%> And Zedekiah בֶֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כְּנַעֲנָ֖ה <S%H3668><s%> of Chenaanah קַרְנֵ֣י <S%H7161><s%> him horns בַרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these תְּנַגַּ֥ח <S%H5055><s%> With these thou shalt push אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> Syria עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3615><s%> until they be consumed

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֨נְּבִאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> And all the prophets נִבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> prophesied כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> thus לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> so saying עֲלֵ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up רָמֹ֤ת <S%H7433><s%> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וְהַצְלַ֔ח <S%H6743><s%> and prosper וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> [it] into the hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

וְהַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the messenger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָלַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> that went לִקְרֹ֣א <S%H7121><s%> to call לְמִיכָ֗יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> Micaiah דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to him saying הִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> Behold the words הַנְּבִאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets פֶּֽה־ <S%H6310><s%> assent אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> with one ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [declare] good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וִֽיהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֧א <S%H4994><s%> please דְבָרְךָ֛ <S%H1697><s%> let thy word כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> therefore I pray thee be like one מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> of them וְדִבַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> of theirs and speak טּֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> thou good

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מִיכָ֑יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> And Micaiah חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> even what my God אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> that will I speak

וַיָּבֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> And when he was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him מִיכָה֙ <S%H4318><s%> unto him Micaiah הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אֶחְדָּ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> or shall I forbear וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> ? And he said עֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> Go ye up וְהַצְלִ֔יחוּ <S%H6743><s%> and prosper וְיִנָּתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and they shall be delivered בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> into your hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> then הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כַּמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> how long פְעָמִ֖ים <S%H6471><s%> to him How many times אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I מַשְׁבִּיעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7650><s%> shall I adjure אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> to me לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nothing תְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> thee that thou say אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but אֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> nothing but the truth בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> to me in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said רָאִ֤יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I did see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> all Israel נְפוֹצִ֣ים <S%H6327><s%> scattered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains כַּצֹּ֕אן <S%H6629><s%> as sheep אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> have לָהֶ֖ן רֹעֶ֑ה <S%H7462><s%> that have no shepherd וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have no אֲדֹנִ֣ים <S%H113><s%> These have no master לָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> let them return אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> [therefore] every man לְבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> in peace
